# Analyze the item codes we already collected

# RSS feed codes (from earlier):
rss_codes = [1312420823, 1312420732, 1312421005, 1312420719, 1312420771, 
             1312420979, 1312298181, 1312422006, 1312420693, 1312420589]

# Category page codes:
category_codes = [1312427908, 1312405613, 1312405522, 1312363259, 1248060735]

print(''=== ITEM CODE PATTERN ANALYSIS ===\n'')
print(''RSS codes (first 10):'')
for code in rss_codes:
    print(f''  {code}'')

print(''\nCategory page codes (first 5):'')
for code in category_codes:
    print(f''  {code}'')

print(''\nKEY OBSERVATION:'')
print(f''  Highest RSS code: {max(rss_codes)}'')
print(f''  Highest category code: {max(category_codes)}'')
print(f''  Difference: {max(category_codes) - max(rss_codes)}\n'')

print(''CONCLUSION:'')
print(''  • Category page has NEWER items than RSS!'')
print(''  • RSS appears to have a delay (not real-time)'')
print(''  • RSS highest: 1312422006'')
print(''  • Category highest: 1312427908 (5899 items newer!)'')
print('''')
print(''  → For FASTEST detection, polling category/search'')
print(''    pages may actually be BETTER than RSS!'')
")
